seo.title: Naples Airport to Positano by Bus | Hostel Brikette
seo.description: From Naples Airport to Positano via Curreri to Sorrento then SITA bus. Tickets, stops, SITA timetable tips, and walking directions to Hostel Brikette.

intro.title: Naples Airport to Positano — Bus
intro.body: This step-by-step guide takes you from Naples Airport to Positano using the Curreri bus to Sorrento, then the SITA bus onward to Positano. It covers tickets, where to change, how to read the SITA timetable, and how to reach Hostel Brikette from the closest stop.

callouts.aside: Need every transport option? Open the %HOWTO:how-to-get-here|How to Get Here overview% for ferries, taxis, and alternative routes.

sections.title: Journey overview
sections.body: Take the Curreri Viaggi bus directly from Naples Airport to Sorrento, then transfer to the SITA bus towards Amalfi (alighting at Positano – Chiesa Nuova). Allow extra time in high season for queues and crowding on popular services.

sections.title: Naples Airport
list: Exit the arrivals area and follow signs to the bus stands outside.
Buy a Curreri Viaggi ticket to Sorrento (online or at the stop).
Wait at the stand for the next bus to Sorrento and board when it arrives.

sections.title: Sorrento bus station
list: Disembark at Sorrento’s main bus station (same location as the train station).
From the bus station, catch the SITA bus towards Amalfi (Positano is on this route).
If needed, purchase a SITA ticket from a nearby bar or newsstand.
When boarding, the driver will stamp or partially tear your ticket — keep it for the entire ride.

sections.title: SITA timetable — how to read it
Positano (Chiesa Nuova) bus stop
list: The nearest SITA stop is Positano (Chiesa Nuova) on Via G. Marconi.
It is approximately 140 metres (490 feet) from the hostel entrance.
The stop sits outside the cafe/bar Bar Internazionale.

sections.title: Walk from the stop to the hostel
sections.body: Tip: approaching the hostel, you’ll spot our sign by the second-floor terrace. Proceed past the sign, curve around the bend, and locate stairs ascending from the right side of the road to reach the main entrance.
list: Walk just over 100 metres / 330 feet along Via G. Marconi.
Turn right and follow the steps up to the hostel’s main door.
